.. py:exception:: DisallowedModelAdminLookup

   Bases: :py:obj:`django.core.exceptions.SuspiciousOperation`


   Invalid filter was passed to admin view via URL querystring


.. py:exception:: DisallowedModelAdminToField

   Bases: :py:obj:`django.core.exceptions.SuspiciousOperation`
